dublinCore.dc:title: HR 4323 ENR: Debbie Smith Reauthorization Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To reauthorize programs authorized under the Debbie Smith Act of 2004, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Debbie Smith Reauthorization Act of 2014.
Section 2 of the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 (42 U.S.C. 14135) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking 2010 through 2018 and inserting 2014 through 2019; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking 2018 and inserting 2019; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (j), by striking 2009 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2019.

section.text: Section 303(b) of the DNA Sexual Assault Justice Act of 2004 (42 U.S.C. 14136(b)) is amended by striking 2009 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2019.
Section 304(c) of the DNA Sexual Assault Justice Act of 2004 (42 U.S.C. 14136a(c)) is amended by striking 2009 through 2014 and inserting 2015 through 2019.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
